name: Charcoal Face Wash
description: Deeply cleanse your skin with our activated charcoal face wash. Removes impurities and excess oil for a fresh, matte finish.

name: Premium Beard Oil
description: Nourish and soften your beard with our premium blend of natural oils. Promotes healthy growth and adds a subtle, masculine scent.

name: Luxury Day Cream
description: Hydrate and protect your skin with our luxury day cream. Enriched with vitamins and antioxidants for a radiant, youthful complexion.

name: Rose Essence Perfume
description: Experience the timeless elegance of rose essence. A delicate and captivating fragrance that lasts all day long.
